availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Philip L. Lee (Bullitt County attorney, soldier, and prov govt)

body.p:
Bullitt County, Kentucky, attorney, soldier, and provisional government convention member. Native of Bullitt County, Kentucky. Son of Wilford Lee and Margaret Lee. Graduate of St. Joseph's College (Bardstown, Kentucky) in 1850. Graduate of the University of Louisville School of Law in 1852.
Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
